issue.title: [Python] Hide internal (common_)metadata related warnings from the user (ParquetDataset)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16336](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16336). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Small follow-up on ARROW-16121, we missed a few cases where we are internally using those attributes (in the `equals` method)
